about_the_game:
"Is it possible that there is a species in this world that will die if they don't laze around?"

This is an AVG text adventure game that tells a story that happened in an overhead world.
In the world that was once destroyed, science became the last beacon of civilization, and the ones in charge of this beacon were a group of mysterious girls with a mission, known as the "Pathfinders".

In the game, you will experience the daily life of a tavern owner named "Antoine", who is a "Pathfinder". Through the cheerful and lively daily routine, you will gradually discover the hidden and most secretive truth. In the final judgment, you will make choices that determine whether Antoine will face a new life or fall back into despair.

Story Overview

The lazy small tavern owner Antoine, who has always valued laziness as the ultimate value of life, is living a leisurely life that seems to last forever. However, when she picks up a snow-white haired girl by accident, her daily routine is completely disrupted. The arrival of the new member has made the originally peaceful life a mess, and the endless surprises have made it difficult for Antoine to cope. When these countless coincidences are linked together, the terrifying truth revealed behind them is even more unexpected for her...

Introduction Of Main Characters

Antoine


The small owner of the Vauquelin City tavern. 'It seems like there's nothing in this world that she cares about, except for those bottles,' said Pika. She yawns and lives a leisurely life, where she can be lazy and take each day as it comes.

Pika


Pika is the true boss of Antoine's Tavern.When Antoine was asleep, she was often responsible for running the tavern. Positive outgoing, caring, love life, but not very good temper.

Levi


The bartender and veritable second in command at Antoine's Tavern.
The extraordinary skill here not only refers to his skillful bartending ability, but also refers to his strong force:All the gangsters who came to make trouble after being drunk were punched and kicked by Revere and thrown out.

Sherrynoll


Antoine's best friend, who is also the owner of the Vauquelin City Medical Center, has deep contacts with the upper class, and at the same time prescribes medicine for the poor. With an elegant temperament and an aristocratic atmosphere in every gesture, it is hard to imagine how Antoine got on the line with such a young lady.

Menzo


A girl picked up by Antoine and Pika in a destroyed village.
She has the stature and appearance of seven or eight years old, but her language organization ability is not as good as that of young children. The reason is still a mystery.Her arrival is just the beginning of the accident...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)，Windows 10 and Windows 11，仅限64位版本
  • Processor: X64 架构（支持 SSE2 指令集）
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 显存1GB及以上，支持 shader model 4.0（DX10）功能的显卡
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 能出声就行
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel

short_description: Antoine is a tavern owner who privately conducts her own secret research. Due to an accident, a little girl enters her life and her once-quiet existence is forever changed. Antoine is forced to take risks involuntarily, and bit by bit the truth of the world is revealed to her again.
